reference: Balassa, Bela (1982), DeveLopment Strategies in Semi-Industrial Economies.

Jones, R. (1971), A Three-Factor Model in Theory, Trade and History, in Trade, Balance of Payments and Growth, J. Bhagwati (ed.), North Holland.
Neary, J. P. (1985), International Factor Mobility, Minimum Wage Rates and Factor Price Equalization: A Synthesis, Quarterly Journal of Economics, pp. 551-570.
